summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; adding a new section to the Seattle Municipal Code to establish the 2005 fee schedule for parking in off-street parking lots located at Green Lake Park/Lower Woodland Park, McCurdy Park, Lake Washington Boulevard/Seward Park, and Lincoln Park; and amending the Seattle Municipal Code Section 18.24.010 to authorize the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to establish regular and special parking fees consistent with the 2005 fee schedule.
